files.content: data class Menu(val id: Int, val name: String, val description: String, val price: Double, val image: String)

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_name"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品名称"/>
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_description"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品介绍"/>
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_price"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品价格"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/upload_button"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="上传菜品"/>
</LinearLayout>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/menu_image"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_name"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_description"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_price"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/like_button"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="点赞"/>
</LinearLayout>

<resources>
    <string name="app_name">牛太郎餐厅</string>
    <string name="menu_name">菜品名称</string>
    <string name="menu_description">菜品介绍</string>
    <string name="menu_price">菜品价格</string>
    <string name="upload_button">上传菜品</string>
    <string name="like_button">点赞</string>
</resources>
